definition: surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)

sentences.english: She works for a lactation consulting group in Fairfax, Virginia.
sentences.chinese: 她在佛吉尼亞費爾法克斯一個哺乳諮詢組織工作。

sentences.english: That July was the hottest month ever in West Virginia.
sentences.chinese: 那年七月是西佛吉尼亞州有史以來最熱的一個月。

sentences.english: Clouds from Earl extend primarily over North Carolina and Virginia.
sentences.chinese: 其外圍雲系伸展到北卡羅來納州和佛吉尼亞州上空。

sentences.english: Alex and Brett will soon strat their second year of university in Virginia.
sentences.chinese: 亞力斯和布萊特很快在佛吉尼亞州大學上大二了。

sentences.english: He spoke on the first day of classes at a high school in Virginia.
sentences.chinese: 他在佛吉尼亞一所高中開學的第一天發表了講話。
